name: PostHog Heartbeat Plugin
description: Creates one event per minute to validate ingestion pipeline

config.markdown: Events are emitted once per minute.

config.name: Events to be emitted
config.hint: The basic `heartbeat` event emitted by this plugin goes straight into the event ingestion queue. The `heartbeat_buffer` is emitted the same way as `heartbeat`, but has a different distinct ID each time to ensure it goes via the event buffer. The `heartbeat_api` event goes via the event capture endpoint, which helps monitor the API too.
